notesStmt.note: Mutilated folios 346 and 347 are stuck together at the end of the manuscript. Efrayim ha-Darshan ben Gershon ha-Rofe: inscribed, folio 346r. Mosheh ben Efrayim ha-Peruz: inscribed in a note, folio 2r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A book of midrashic commentaries called Tsintsenet ha-man by Efraim ha-Darshan ben Gershon ha-Rofe.

collation.p: Irregular quires of 10 to 14 leaves each.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Ephraim b. Gerson. Midrashim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1307.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Fischl Hirsch: purchased from him by the British Museum on 10 April 1875: inscribed, folio [347v].
